body.section: The workbench is capable of displaying multiple taxonomy trees in the taxonomy pane, and descriptions from those taxonomies may be needed in other views and panes also. Sometimes new description types are introduced when new terminologies are to be brought into the workbench, such as ICD10. If the corresponding descriptions don't appear in the taxonomy of other views, then check to ensure that the required description types have been set in the View - descriptions pane of the preferences panel, as shown in .

fig.title: Adding new description type in preferences panel

body.section: Also ensure that the taxonomy root is listed in the View - taxonomy pane of the preferences panel, as shown in .

fig.title: Adding a taxonomy root concept in preferences panel

body.section: Finally, check that the relevant taxonomy reltationships are listed in the View - taxonomy pane of the preferences panel, as shown in .
